title.native: 少女☆寸劇(コント) オールスタァライト

description: New anime in the Revue Starlight franchise featuring chibi versions of the characters and the girls from the other schools from the mobile phone game.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

title.native: 少女☆歌劇 レヴュー・スタァライト

node.description:
[Website](http://meganebanchow.com/) | [Blog](http://meganebanchow.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MeganeBanchow)

Also worked on the music for Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko as part of the unit Franz Maxwell I.

__Height:__ 157 cm (5'2")

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/maho_tomita6261) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/maho_tomita6261/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/maho-time/) | [Agency Profile](http://mahoch.fun/profile.html)

A Japanese actress, voice actress, and singer. She has appeared in many musicals, TV dramas, movies, and stage plays.

__Agency:__ Hibiki

[Website](http://mimorin.com/) | [Profile (Hibiki Cast)](https://hibiki-cast.jp/hibiki_f/mimori_suzuko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mimori_suzuko)  | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mimorin.official/) | [LINE Blog](https://lineblog.me/mimori_suzuko/)

**Non anime roles:**
- Sangonomiya Kokomi - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Match - Kirara Fantasia (VG)
- Pinkie Pie - My Little Pony Friendship is Magic (Japanese dub)
- Rapunzel - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)

[Website](https://hibiki-cast.jp/hibiki_f/aiba/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aibaaiai) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/aiba_aiai/)

A voice actor and the lead singer of the band [Roselia](https://anilist.co/staff/153170/Roselia). Before becoming a seiyuu, she was a professional wrestler under the name "Yuuki Harima" for about 2 years, and also worked as a stage actress.

Aina is energetic, jokes around a lot, and often has a hard time staying in-character. One of her hobbies is looking after race horses. She also loves singing karaoke; one of her favorite songs to sing is "only my railgun."

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ayasa_ito) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayasacream/) A voice actor and the keyboardist of [Poppin'Party](https://anilist.co/staff/153185/PoppinParty). Ayasa used to live in Kyoto, before moving to Tokyo after graduating from high school in 2015. She played the piano ever since she was 3, but dropped it when she was in first grade. In middle school, she was made to try a voice acting part in the NHK Studio Park, and she then aimed to become a seiyuu after being praised for doing a good job at it. In 2010, she tried out for the Milky Holmes Seiyuu Audition Tour, but was knocked out of the at the semi-finals in the Osaka auditions. She later debuted as a voice actress after winning the role of Alice Myoujingawa in Futari wa Milky Holmes during the Milky Holmes Sisters Members Scout Audition on April 27, 2013. Together with Aimi Terakawa, they formed the unit Milky Holmes Feathers. Before dropping her high school activities in 2013 in order to study acting seriously, Ayasa was also the president of the Theater Club and part of the choir at her school. Ayasa's hobbies include watching cooking shows and theater plays and playing games. Among her skills are speaking in the Kyoto Dialect and hair arrangement. Ayasa is also an avid lover of the Takarazuka Revue, and fell in love with it after her grandmother took her to see one of their plays when she was in ninth grade. (Source: BanG Dream! Wikia, edited) Non-Anime Roles: - Cipher - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

__Height:__ 154cm

[Profile](https://www.mirai-pictures-japan.jp/type_actors/岩田%e3%80%80陽葵) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/har043smile/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/haruki_iwata) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岩田陽葵)

She is from a family of voice actors, her uncle is [Mitsuo Iwata](https://anilist.co/staff/95399/), aunt [AKIKO](https://anilist.co/staff/105271/), aunt-in-law [Rikako Iwata (Aikawa)](https://anilist.co/staff/96840/).

[Website](http://kanatanakamura.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kanata_nakamura?s=09) 

She used to study abroad in France during her high school days. Graduated from Seijo University, Department of Literature.

Debuted in 2009 as Lyricist "KANATA". She is affiliated with [APDREAM](http://apdream.co.jp/)

__[Profile (Love Annex)](https://love-annex.jp/creators/%e7%9f%b3%e5%80%89%e8%aa%89%e4%b9%8b-%e9%ba%bf/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/marodrum)__ A Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger, drummer and pianist.

__[Profile (Love Annex)](https://love-annex.jp/creators/%e7%9f%b3%e5%80%89%e8%aa%89%e4%b9%8b-%e9%ba%bf/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/marodrum)__ A Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger, drummer and pianist.
